mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.clazz AS "clazz", a.keyss AS "keyss", a.max_byte AS "maxByte", a.sysmax_val AS "sysmaxVal", a.format AS "format", a.prefix AS "prefix", a.postfix AS "postfix", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_no( id, name, clazz, keyss, max_byte, sysmax_val, format, prefix, postfix, update_date, update_by, create_date, create_by, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{clazz}, #{keyss}, #{maxByte}, #{sysmaxVal}, #{format}, #{prefix}, #{postfix}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_no SET name = #{name}, clazz = #{clazz}, keyss = #{keyss}, max_byte = #{maxByte}, sysmax_val = #{sysmaxVal}, format = #{format}, prefix = #{prefix}, postfix = #{postfix}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
